com.facebook.buck.util.cache

Interface FileHashCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FileHashLoader
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectFileHashCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFileHashCache, NullFileHashCache, StackedFileHashCache, WatchedFileHashCache

    public interface FileHashCache
extends FileHashLoader
    A cache which maps Paths to cached hashes of their contents, based on a simplified subset of the java.util.Map<Path, HashCode> interface.
